<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a0a98238e0b4ad204e6bf241ab4cefe47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a0a98238e0b4ad204e6bf241ab4cefe47">computeBlockRThroughput</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedmodel">MCSchedModel</a> &amp;SM, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DispatchWidth,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumMicroOps,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> ProcResourceUsage) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The block throughput is bounded from above by the hardware dispatch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// throughput. That is because the DispatchWidth is an upper bound on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of opcodes that can be part of a single dispatch group.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Max = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(NumMicroOps) / DispatchWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The block throughput is also limited by the amount of hardware parallelism.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of available resource units affects the resource pressure</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distribution, as well as how many blocks can be executed every cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = SM.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedmodel/#a5268bc4b5673e84a8f75df74b024d374">getNumProcResourceKinds</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles">ReleaseAtCycles</a> = ProcResourceUsage&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles">ReleaseAtCycles</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcprocresourcedesc">MCProcResourceDesc</a> &amp;MCDesc = &#42;SM.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedmodel/#ac7376c4db05cd0fbb107dd0b1fecc9ba">getProcResource</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Throughput = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles">ReleaseAtCycles</a>) / MCDesc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcprocresourcedesc/#a9d4d0cc34fcce4779dc4445d8265fffc">NumUnits</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    Max = std::max(Max, Throughput);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The block reciprocal throughput is computed as the MAX of:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - (NumMicroOps / DispatchWidth)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - (NumUnits / ReleaseAtCycles)   for every consumed processor resource.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Max;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace mca</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


</DoxygenPage>
